title: Absolute Happiness☆Heroine - Novel Updates

description:
On that day, I regained my memories and fainted. Why? It’s because I realized that I, Saracia, am a villainess destined to die 100% no matter the route.

What does tomorrow look like for a villainess discovered by the heroine?

(Short one shot about girl who is reincarnated as villainess, nothing really happens)>
